2067970.name: LoveTalks
2067970.description:
【Story】
You are a high school second-year student who has just transferred to a new school. You want to talk to a girl you like to get a girlfriend, but you don't know what to talk about. First, let's explore the school and find a topic to talk about.

【About this game】
This is a dating sim where you explore the school to find conversation topics and talk to the heroine.
The goal of the game is to ask the heroine to the school festival within 7 days.
There are three heroines.

【Controls】
・Talk
Left click : Go to the next dialog
Arrow Keys : Selects choices
Mouse wheel Down : Skip

・Move
W:Move Forward S:Move Back A:Move Left D:Move Right
Shift : Sprint
Move Mouse : Camera
Left click (Click around the character's chest) : Talk
Escape : Pause
